pageContext.claim: “I like to do polls that are cheap. I hate to say it. This is a cheap poll, but it's better than any poll you could get. You ever see they go out in the interview like 103 people. I got thousands here tonight. Well, I think we'll have to consider that then.”
pageContext.analysis: The crowd at a Trump campaign rally is hardly representative of the general population. Reputable polls attempt to give a snapshot of where the general population is on a given issue.
